message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $9,500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $8,750. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I really need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible. Can you consider that?
